Text:
it's an episode s01e14 Better Angels, not 13 !!!

extv, correct your flaw numeration!!!

the first new episode was named:

Flashforward S01E11-E12 HDTV XviD-2HD [eztv]

and it was double-episode;

and then you start counting from 12 instead 13 !

CORRECT THIS SH$T
This has been incorrectly named since the first double ep everywhere, I just add 1 to the ep number to know which one it is :p
This is NOT the "Blowback" episode, this is "Better Angels"! So far I haven't been able to find anyone who has the "Blowback" episode uploaded.

Damn it! I want the Blowback ep.
How this confusion started?
